Status 1xx: Informational

Outline (Status 1xx: Informational)

  1. Status 1xx: Informational [0]
  2. Status 2xx: Successful [0]
  3. Status 3xx: Redirection [0]
  4. Status 4xx: Client Error [0]
  5. Status 5xx: Server Error [0]
  6. Thank You! [1]
